summary: Provides comprehensive unit tests for the Solovay‑Kitaev quantum compilation pass and its supporting utilities, covering gate sequence handling, approximation accuracy, error conditions, default configurations, identity generation, plugin integration, basis‑gate representation, and overall unitary synthesis within the Qiskit transpiler framework.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness and performance of the Solovay‑Kitaev algorithm implementation, ensuring reliable quantum circuit synthesis and preventing regressions in the transpilation pipeline.
